tool_description: An api showing all the climate change new around the world
name: Climate Change Live Pro
title: Climate Change Live Pro

api_list.name: Get all climate change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate change from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-pro.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get individual news source
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-pro.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-pro.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
